channel.title: Need help with error
channel.description:
whenever im trying to run my server i get: [code]Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29)[/code]
When i try to log onto my server it says I'm already logged on Anyone know what is going wrong I'm a nub at making servers :P
